title: Is the Villain Not Allowed to Fall in Love? - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Drama   Fantasy   Josei   Romance   School Life
tags: Aristocracy   Arranged Marriage   Engagement   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Magic   Nobles   Possessive Characters   Reincarnated in Another World   Reverse Harem   Villainess Noble Girls
author: Hazuki Chlor   Hazuki Kuroru   葉月クロル
description: The otome game world's villainess Millene's past life was a Japanese high school girl. When she was young, she was a naughty kid, and now when she met the sparkling 17-year-old Prince Rendor, her memories returned, but the 15-year-old animal lover Millene once again had her heart stolen by him, while seemingly sticky and full of misundertandings, she's trying her best to have a happy marriage, that kind of exciting and fairly sweet story.>
